nodes.text: Kinetite was a power of the Force that was a variant of Force lightning. Kinetite could be used by turning Force lightning into a sphere of controlled kinetic energy which could be projected at an enemy, yet, it could be deflected.
Kinetite was also used to refer to kinetic energy that had been collected by a Kinetite generator, stored as a kinetite charge, to be released as a concussive blast wave.
